title: SHEN REWORK!! (VALID PROOF)

embed.description: 13;       Champion Updates  Why do we have updates? Can I have a refund for a updated champion?  Upcoming Updates Previous Updates...

body: On the official league of legends "Zed" champion page http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/zed/ there is a moving champion picture as long as a short scene which reveals what looks like zed dying. I believe that Riot is going to be doing something similar to what they did with Gangplank in which they unveiled an event and killed Gangplank off and Reworked him{{champion:41}}  (along with releasing multiple other skins for champions). Zed{{champion:238}}  is a known Rival to Shen{{champion:98}}  in the league lore. Prediction: They kill zed off and disable him for a certain time, shen gets his rework, skins come out for the new assassin item patch, zed comes back with an ultimate skin!!! Let me know what you guys think!!!!

replies.body: Maybe Shen finds an old practice like Zed does but it isn't a forbidden art. Then Shen and Zed have a final battle. Who will win? Who will lose? Find out next time on Ionia Z!

Ah, the ancient ninja art of "Flower Power".

I just imagine Shen throwing little seeds at people that explode into flowers.

"FORBIDDEN ART THIS, YOU FOOL"
Oh boy, this will take like, months won't it?
Or years like Ao Shin
Its a bullet that kills zed
That or Shen gets wise and plays dirty like Zed, which catches Zed completely off guard, allowing Shen to come out the victor. Boom, canonical validation for a potentially badass Shen rework.

You clearly don't know what "valid proof" means. Sorry to ruin the hype, but this is just a speculation.
For more information on the matter, I would suggest you to visit Surrender@20's page (http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/12/mysterious-teaser.html).
It shows that there are references for similar upcoming teasers for Vi, Sona, and Garen. Many have speculated that DeadEye is a new champion, a marksman, probably named Jhin (name that appears in the files) because we can hear a gun shot in Zed's teaser (which has nothing to do with Shen's identity). On top of that, Zed is a mid assassin, Sona a support mage, Garen a top juggernaut, Vi a jungle fighter: do you notice what's missing?

Made me think of cherry blossom or perhaps lotus flower petals.

Will be interesting to see if kennen akali or syndra feature in this aswell. They are allies or rivals of the two
I cant wait to find out! they are definitely planning something!

Hopefully an event which features all the ionian champions (some karma and varus please) and not just shen vs zed.

We will find out soon enough
Varus PLEASE!
It would also be fun to know why Lee Sin gets Energy when he isn't a ninja, he's a blind monk.

Highly doubt it, but Shen keeps balance.

Killing Zed - Appears to be extremely evil, Plausible
Killing Sona - Extremely good? Maybe?
Killing Garen - Extremely Lawful Zealot, Plausible
Killing Vi - Extremely Chaotic, Kinda Plausible?

Seems a little off though to me

If anything it's a skin teaser in my opinion, maybe Shen is just getting a new skin for once and this is how they are making it out to hype it up, but who knows they have pushed champion after champion out this year maybe they will actually give us someone who can break illaoi's teeth in with out having the ability to wreck and entire team in one team fight.
WHY SHOULD ZED DIE?!{ {{champion:238}}  {{item:3070}}

Look you could play all champions tank so can you make Shen like fighter or assassin if you see zed vs Shen zed will surely win  in game so I dont say you should nerf zed (I like playing him) i say that you should make Shen more balanced fighter or assassin that can play on top or mid.Becuse he is flippin ninja not tank when did you see ninja taking lots of damage, thats right you didnt ,so thats the concept maybe invisibilty Becuse of his qoute "if lightnig travel so fast how come it didnt caught ninja" idk tell  me what do you think?

If you take a closer look at the artwork, you'll notice that the branches aren't originating only from his eyes. but also from his torso. Sakura leaves could symbolize being "reborn", and add to that that the shadows are backing/clearing away from the branches, I think whatever this is, it has to do something with Zed getting purified.
Maybe Zed leaves his dark side and becomes a sign of purity, meaning that he is no longer the master of shadows.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/21hioIJv-garen-sona-vi-animated-portraits
which would make me think that it'd be an ultimate skin
i dont think zed is getting a ultimate skin,  he just got a project skin^^

well I'm not sure if he is or isn't, it could just be a 1350 skin, but I  will say this. If it will make a large amount of money, riot will put it out no matter the previous skins made for the champion.
